title: In diamond, people give up games ALOT easier.
body:
Especially Diamond 4-5. I'm not saying straight up trolling at one point but games are very one-sided and when people are behind they generally show signs of not wanting to play anymore.

Examples include:
-Ulting minions
-Letting the fed opponent kill you if you are caught out rather than fighting back or running
-Dancing around base turrets

I know this kind of stuff happens at other elos for various reasons but trust me, it is really bad at diamond.
